Name: Floor Massacre
About the game: Floor massacre is a horror first-person shooter with lowpoly voxel graphics. You have to survive in a huge house firing off numerous zombies and moving along the floors to the end of the level. On the way collecting first-aid kits and ammo. The main goal is to stay alive and score the greatest kill count. Features: - Voxel stylish graphics. - Several weapons to exterminate walking dead.
